Package be.helha.api_recettapp.repositories.jpa

Interface EntryRepository

All Superinterfaces:
org.springframework.data.repository.CrudRepository<Entry,Integer>, org.springframework.data.jpa.repository.JpaRepository<Entry,Integer>, org.springframework.data.repository.ListCrudRepository<Entry,Integer>, org.springframework.data.repository.ListPagingAndSortingRepository<Entry,Integer>, org.springframework.data.repository.PagingAndSortingRepository<Entry,Integer>, org.springframework.data.repository.query.QueryByExampleExecutor<Entry>, org.springframework.data.repository.Repository<Entry,Integer>
@Repository public interface EntryRepository extends org.springframework.data.jpa.repository.JpaRepository<Entry,Integer>
Repository interface for managing Entry entities. Provides methods to perform CRUD operations and custom queries on Entry data.

  • Method Details

    • findByUuid

      Entry findByUuid(UUID uuid)
      Finds an Entry by its UUID.
      Parameters:
      uuid - the universal unique identifier of the Entry.
      Returns:
      the Entry associated with the given UUID.

    • findEntriesByContestId

      List<Entry> findEntriesByContestId(Integer idContest)
      Finds all Entries associated with a specific Contest ID.
      Parameters:
      idContest - the ID of the Contest.
      Returns:
      a list of Entries linked to the given Contest ID.

    • findEntriesByUsersId

      List<Entry> findEntriesByUsersId(long idUsers)
      Finds all Entries associated with a specific User ID.
      Parameters:
      idUsers - the ID of the User.
      Returns:
      a list of Entries linked to the given User ID.

    • findByUsersAndContest

      Entry findByUsersAndContest(Users user, Contest contest)
      Finds an Entry by a specific User and Contest.
      Parameters:
      user - the User associated with the Entry.
      contest - the Contest associated with the Entry.
      Returns:
      the Entry associated with the given User and Contest.

    • findByContestIdAndUserEmail

      @Query("SELECT e FROM Entry e WHERE e.contest.id = :idContest AND e.users.email = :userMail") Optional<Entry> findByContestIdAndUserEmail(@Param("idContest") int idContest, @Param("userMail") String userMail)
      Finds an Entry by Contest ID and User email.
      Parameters:
      idContest - the ID of the Contest.
      userMail - the email of the User.
      Returns:
      an Optional containing the Entry if found, or empty otherwise.
